description: Try our easy to follow Sweet & Sour Pork & Pineapple With Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet & Sour Pork & Pineapple With Noodles
name: Sweet & Sour Pork & Pineapple With Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 225 g can pineapple pieces in juice

recipeInstructions.text: Heat remaining oil and cook onion and bok choy for 2 minutes. Add pork, pineapple pieces, sauce and noodles. Toss to combine everything and cook for 1 minute to reheat. Serve topped with coriander and chilli.
